sentences.en: A gold bracelet dangled from his left wrist.
sentences.cn: 一只金手镯在他左腕上晃来晃去。

sentences.en: A good pay package and a company car were dangled in front of her.
sentences.cn: 优厚的薪酬和公司配车摆在她面前。

sentences.en: At Christmas, we dangle colored lights around the room.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节时, 我们在房间里挂上彩灯.

sentences.en: Dangle , dangle, clusters of wisteria flowers.
sentences.cn: 飘摇, 飘摇, 串串的紫藤花朵.

sentences.en: Don't dangle the lights before me. It will do harm to my eyes.
sentences.cn: 别把灯在我面前晃来晃去, 对我眼不好.

sentences.en: Four empty gas cans dangle from the rear bumper, and yellow police tape serves as streamers.
sentences.cn: 后缓冲器上拖着四个摇摆不定的空气罐, 而黄色警用带则用作彩带装饰.

sentences.en: He sits on the edge of the table dangle his leg.
sentences.cn: 他坐在桌子边上,摆动著双腿.

sentences.en: His great arms dangle loosely at his sides, the palms of his hands open.
sentences.cn: 他的一双粗大的胳膊软绵绵地垂在身子两旁, 手张开着.

sentences.en: I don't want to dangle from a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 我不想吊在一棵枝形吊灯上.

sentences.en: I showed her how to dangle.
sentences.cn: 福:我教她怎么从树上倒吊.

sentences.en: It's very interesting to dangle the ball on a string before the cat.
sentences.cn: 在小猫眼前晃线球很有意思.

sentences.en: Like I always say, " The angle of the dangle equals the cubic of the pubic . "
sentences.cn: 正如我常说的摇摆物的角度等于 阴部 的体积.

sentences.en: My sister has several boys to dangle about ( around , round )
sentences.cn: 有几个男孩在追我妹妹.

sentences.en: Or bend over and let your arms dangle , relaxing all your muscles.
sentences.cn: 或者弓腰垂臂,让手臂垂下摆动, 松驰筋肉.

sentences.en: Several young men dangle after the pretty girl.
sentences.cn: 好几个青年男子追随那漂亮女孩.

sentences.en: She likes to dangle her men around her.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢让男人们围着她.

sentences.en: The babies ornament her ankles, dangle from her pant legs ( Carolyn Chute )
sentences.cn: 孩子们简直就是她脚踝的饰物, 随着她的裤腿摆荡 ( 卡罗琳丘特 )

trans.tran_en: to offer something good to someone, in order to persuade them to do something

trans.tran_cn: 悬荡，垂着摆动，尾随，追逐
使摇晃地挂着或摆荡，悬而未定
